title: Blake Lively Shares Her Baby Registry, Sheds Light on New-Mom Wellness
text:
Blake Lively isn’t a regular mom, she’s a cool mom—and an aspirational one at that. After reportedly welcoming her third child with Ryan Reynolds over the summer—a sibling to Inez, 2, and James, 4—the actor is now the matriarch of a fairly full nest. As such, it’s only natural that Lively has cultivated a list of baby-oriented favorites, which she shared today on Amazon to the delight of new moms everywhere.

In keeping with the far-more-candid postpartum conversation that’s entered the ether in recent years, Lively’s picks include items for the human who did the actual birthing—think Frida Mom’s Labor and Delivery Gown or Lavanila’s The Healthy Deodorant—as well as books, bottles, and bath toys designed with newer additions in mind. The registry feels right on time, as while many mothers are prepped on what to expect whilst expecting, the post-pregnancy period (sometimes referred to as the fourth trimester) is a bit more opaque; having a list of tried-and-true essentials can only help parents ease into life with a tiny new roommate. “I understand how overwhelming it is to be a new parent,” says Lively. “What they don’t tell you is it never gets less overwhelming, but with each kid I do learn more.”

Originally Appeared on Vogue
description: Blake Lively partners with Amazon to create a registry of curated new-mom picks.
